name: Wrong Stop
description:
Wrong Stop is a beat em up about a chicken named Cluck. Cluck seems to be having a hard time getting onto the right bus.. Now he must fight through unfriendly neighborhoods to reach the right bus and get home.

Contains a PC and a Mac build

Controls: Use the arrow keys or A to move left and D to move right.

Punching is the U key

Blocking is the I Key
